entry.title: Last try: Fixes for 0.4
entry.summary: The author mentions the fixes for bugs that still remain in 0.4rc1 and provides details about the specific branches that contain those bugfixes such as bugfix_getwork_newblk_race, getwork_dedupe, boost_fs3, gitignore. The author also mentions an additional branch named base58_liberal_parsing that adds tolerance to human error typing in base58 with ambiguous symbols and should be safe to merge. The author suggests that all these branches can be merged by using the command “git fetch git://gitorious.org/~Luke-Jr/bitcoin/luke-jr-bitcoin.git && git merge FETCH_HEAD”.
